attributes.action: Have a FREE vote in parliament to transfer our foreign aid budget in support of flood victims in the UK
attributes.additional_details: We want our government to firstly supports us, we require the government to have a free vote in parliament to enact a bill to support us in the aid of victims of flooding and other disasters in favour of any other other countries or states. As tax payers this should be a fundamental right! There should be a consideration in law that the UK comes first.
